title: Big South Fork National River & Recreation Area: Ranger-led Activities
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Ranger-led Activities               Ranger-led Activities       Enhance your understanding and enjoyment of Big South Fork National River & Recreation Area by taking part in a ranger-led program. Programs are offered at various locations Memorial Day through Labor Day. Topics include plants, animals, recreational activities, and more! All ranger-led programs are free. Call the visitor center for the latest location, time, and subject.           2016 RANGER-LED ACTIVITIES  DOWNLOAD     Kentucky District    Click Here     Tennessee District    Click Here     Rugby    Click Here     SPECIAL REQUEST PROGRAMS Schedule permitting, park rangers are available for on-site special request programs and off-site presentations for school groups, civic organizations and other local groups.  For information and scheduling, please contact the Environmental Education and Outreach Coordinator at 423-286-9059 ext. 29.      Click here for information about special events.
